text: Mr. Ong is a very caring, dedicated and experienced tutor. Thanks to his guidance and teaching methods my daughter managed to score very well in Math and Science examination. Highly recommended!! üëç

Mr Ong is a very kind and attentive teacher which will helped me whenever I needed help. Through his lessons for 2 years I managed to improve my physics results from D7 to B3  and a distinction in Amath. I highly recommend Mr Ong!!!

To Mr Ong thank you for the 2 years!!!

My kids enjoyed their science lessons and their results improved tremendously AL1 & AL 3 . The teacher Angie have patient and are knowledge and helpful. Worksheets are well prepared too. I will definitely recommend this centre to others.

Teacher Angie and Mr Ong helped my son improve his science from fail to AL3 in PSLE! Their teaching methods are understandable and effective. And his Chinese is improved from fail to AL5. Teachers there are all very patient and experienced. Will recommend to friends.

author_name: DARIUS JUDAH CHEW QIN KAI Student
text: I am a student from here and I have to say it is very helpful as i got A1 for science and A2 for math! The environment and atmosphere is very calming and the people running the place is very welcoming and always wanting to help. APPROVED!
